wiki.content: Music video by Bastille performing Pompeii. (P) 2013 The copyright in this audiovisual recording is owned by Virgin Records Ltd. Four piece South London band Bastille are Dan Smith, Chris Wood, Will Farquarson and Kyle Simmons. Their name comes from Bastille Day, the day Dan was born. 'Pompeii' peaked at #2 in the UK singles chart on release in January 2013. Their debut album 'Bad Blood' was released March 2013. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

'Pompeii' peaked at #2 in the UK singles chart on release in January 2013. Their debut album 'Bad Blood' was released March 2013.
